nodes.text: Sutha was a male Hutt who lived during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Sutha served the powerful Hutt Clan, primarily the clan's leader, Jabba. After Imperial forces led by Darth Vader eliminated the rival Son-tuul Pride, Sutha met with Vader to discuss terms between the Empire and the Hutt Cartel. They agreed on a partnership that was mutually beneficial, with the Empire agreeing to eliminate competitors like the Son-tuul Pride, which would open up new markets to the cartels, in exchange for the Hutts supplying the Empire.
